settings.title: eCan.ai RAG Configuration
settings.subtitle: Manage all eCan.ai RAG configuration parameters
settings.restartPrompt: Configuration saved. Apply changes to eCan.ai RAG service now?

tooltips.host: Server listening address, 0.0.0.0 means listen on all network interfaces
tooltips.timeout: Gunicorn worker timeout in seconds, also serves as default LLM request timeout
tooltips.corsOrigins: Allowed CORS origins, separated by commas
tooltips.inputDir: Absolute path for document input directory
tooltips.workingDir: Absolute path for working directory to store RAG data
tooltips.tiktokenCacheDir: Tiktoken cache directory for offline deployment
tooltips.authAccounts: Authentication accounts, format: username:password, multiple accounts separated by commas
tooltips.apiKey: API key to access LightRAG Server API, use with 'X-API-Key' header in HTTP requests
tooltips.enableLlmCache: Enable LLM response cache for queries (not valid for streaming responses)
tooltips.topK: Number of entities or relations retrieved from knowledge graph
tooltips.chunkTopK: Maximum number of chunks for naive vector search
tooltips.maxEntityTokens: Control the actual number of entities sent to LLM
tooltips.maxRelationTokens: Control the actual number of relations sent to LLM
tooltips.maxTotalTokens: Maximum tokens sent to LLM (including entities, relations and chunks)
tooltips.kgChunkPickMethod: Chunk selection strategy: VECTOR (similarity) or WEIGHT (entity and chunk weight)
tooltips.summaryLanguage: Document processing output language: English, Chinese, French, German, etc.
tooltips.entityTypes: List of entity types that the LLM will attempt to recognize
tooltips.forceLlmSummary: Number of segments or tokens to trigger LLM summary (at least 3 recommended)
tooltips.relatedChunkNumber: Maximum number of related chunks per source entity or relation
tooltips.maxAsync: Max concurrency requests of LLM (for both query and document processing)
tooltips.maxParallelInsert: Number of parallel processing documents (between 2~10, MAX_ASYNC/3 recommended)
tooltips.maxGraphNodes: Max nodes for graph retrieval, ensure WebUI local settings are also updated
tooltips.workspace: Workspace name for isolating data from different LightRAG instances
tooltips.rerankBinding: Rerank provider type: null, cohere, jina, aliyun. For vLLM deployed models use cohere binding
tooltips.rerankByDefault: Enable rerank by default in query params when RERANK_BINDING is not null
tooltips.minRerankScore: Rerank score chunk filter (set to 0.0 to keep all chunks, 0.6 or above if LLM is not strong enough)
tooltips.llmBinding: LLM provider type: openai, ollama, lollms, azure_openai, aws_bedrock, gemini
tooltips.llmTimeout: LLM request timeout setting for all llm (0 means no timeout for Ollama)
tooltips.geminiThinking: Gemini thinking configuration, enable or disable thinking mode
tooltips.ollamaNumCtx: Must be provided, should be at least larger than MAX_TOTAL_TOKENS + 2000
tooltips.embeddingBinding: Embedding provider type: ollama, openai, azure_openai, jina, lollms, aws_bedrock
tooltips.embeddingDim: Embedding dimension, should not be changed after first file processed
tooltips.embeddingSendDim: Whether to send dimension parameter to embedding API. Jina always sends (API requirement)
tooltips.evalLlmApiKey: API key for LLM evaluation (fallback to OPENAI_API_KEY if not set)
tooltips.evalMaxConcurrent: Number of concurrent test case evaluations. Lower values reduce API rate limit issues but increase evaluation time
tooltips.connectionRetries: Number of retry attempts for database connections (1-10)
tooltips.retryBackoff: Initial backoff time between retries in seconds (0.1-5.0)
